title: Shack Sauce
full_text:
Shack Sauce
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
0 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4 servings
Makes
3/4 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
(
120
ml
)
mayonnaise
1
tablespoon
(
15
ml
)
ketchup
1
tablespoon
(
15
ml
)
yellow mustard
4
slices
kosher
dill pickle
, finely chopped
1/4
teaspoon
garlic powder
1/4
teaspoon
paprika
Pinch
cayenne pepper
Directions
Combine all ingredients in a countertop blender jar and blend on high until smooth, scraping down sides of blender with rubber spatula as necessary, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Transfer sauce to an airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use (sauce can be refrigerated for up to 5 days).
Serious Eats / Andrew Janjigian
Special Equipment
Blender
Make-Ahead and Storage
Sauce can be refrigerated an airtight container for up to 5 days.
